thread.section_title: Marley Spoon Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Marley Spoon | marleyspoon.com | 2 of 18
thread.title: Evelyne

author: Evelyne
title: Evelyne
text:
All recipes done so far ( I have done more than 25) have been a success at my house, wish is me, my husband and our 4 year old.
Portions are most of the time enough for the 3 of us, on a 2 portion sizing.
I had very little issues with the delivery, but when i did, I got very good service and compensation. The app is easy to use, the recipes take between 30 and 40 minutes to make, price is competitive.
